remarks: Orthocomplement of a closed subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochvalr3.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
dochvalr3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochvalr3.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochvalr3.n $e |- N = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochvalr3.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochvalr3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dochvalr3 $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( `' I ` X ) ) = ( `' I ` ( N ` X ) ) ) $.
